subject: Basketball
Doping (Sports)
Human Growth Hormone
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: Adding blood tests for H.G.H., which can aid muscle building and recovery, aligns the N.B.A. with other American sports leagues that have implemented such testing.
snippet: Adding blood tests for H.G.H., which can aid muscle building and recovery, aligns the N.B.A. with other American sports leagues that have implemented such testing.
